alert.note: Alert for Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Wichita County through 830 PM CDT... At 742 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southwest of Leoti, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall. Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Torrential rainfall with this storm may lead to brief, localized flooding. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Wichita County, including the following locations... Lydia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
